text:
="preserve">Emmanuele Kanyama (25 December 1962 – 17 February 2018) was a Malawian Roman Catholic bishop.
Kanyama was ordained to the priesthood in 1990. He served as bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Dedza, Malawi, from 2007 until his death.
Kanyama died of complications from diabetes on 17 February 2018 at the age of 55.
